location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 16 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a dispatch from Henry Willock, HM charg√© d'affaires at the Court of Persia. It notes that the Resident has received instructions from Henry Willock ordering him to retain any public letters at Bushire and forward any private ones to his brother Major George Willock at Tabreez [Tabriz].
